verses.verse: I love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, because he has heard <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%> and my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
Because he has inclined <S%H5186><s%> his ear <S%H241><s%> unto me <S%H7121><s%>, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live <S%H3117><s%>.

The sorrows <S%H2256><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> surrounded <S%H661><s%> me <S%H4712><s%>, and the pains of hell <S%H7585><s%> got a hold <S%H4672><s%> on me <S%H4672><s%>: I found trouble <S%H6869><s%> and sorrow <S%H3015><s%>.
Then called <S%H7121><s%> I upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I beg <S%H577><s%> you <S%H4422><s%>, deliver my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
Gracious <S%H2587><s%> is the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and righteous <S%H6662><s%>; Yes <S%H430><s%>, our God is merciful <S%H7355><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> the simple <S%H6612><s%>: I was brought low <S%H1809><s%>, and he helped me <S%H3467><s%>.
Return <S%H7725><s%> unto your rest <S%H4494><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has dealt bountifully with you <S%H1580><s%>.
For you have delivered <S%H2502><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>, my eyes <S%H5869><s%> from tears <S%H1832><s%>, and my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling <S%H1762><s%>.
I will walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%>.
I believed <S%H539><s%>, therefore have I spoken <S%H1696><s%>: I was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afflicted <S%H6031><s%>:
I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste <S%H2648><s%>, All men <S%H120><s%> are liars <S%H3576><s%>.
What shall I render <S%H7725><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for all his benefits toward me <S%H8408><s%>?
I will take <S%H5375><s%> the cup <S%H3563><s%> of salvation <S%H3444><s%>, and call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> now in the presence of all his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Precious <S%H3368><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the death <S%H4194><s%> of his saints <S%H2623><s%>.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, truly <S%H577><s%> I am your servant <S%H5650><s%>; I am your servant <S%H5650><s%>, and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid <S%H519><s%>: you have loosened <S%H6605><s%> my bonds <S%H4147><s%>.
I will offer <S%H2076><s%> to you the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, and will call <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
I will pay <S%H7999><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> now in the presence of all his people <S%H5971><s%>,
In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you <S%H3389><s%>, O Jerusalem. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
